settings.predefinedAvatarsOnlyHelp: Removes the ability to upload custom avatar images unless you have the permission below.
settings.predefinedAvatarsNoRemoveHelp: Users who already have a custom or predefined avatar will not be able to go back to the default "initials" avatar unless they have the permission below.
settings.predefinedAvatarsDefaultHelp: Applies to new users at registration.
settings.predefinedAvatarsHelp: The files are not resized or converted. Make sure to resize, compress and export them in the format of your choice before uploading. Flarum works best with square 100x100 png or jpg images, but you can take advantage of other resolutions with custom CSS.

permissions.setPredefinedAvatar: Choose an avatar from the predefined list
